title: How to Cook Prime Rib on the Pellet Grill and Smoker
description:
Take a closer look at how to make that perfect prime rib on the camp chef pellet grill and smoker.  This mouth watering recipe will leave you wanting more!  A great way to grill and smoke outdoors this summer

http://www.campchef.com/pellet-grill-smoker-d

asset.author: Camp Chef
